**PROJECT PHOENIX** 

![PNtElyx.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/PNtElyx.png?1)

**Concept:**

*The End is nigh for our brave Kerbalnaugts and the proud people of Kerbin.* 

*After many years of running a space program, and making slow, but steady progress, including building a small Kerbin satellite communications network, and launching their first space telescope, the Scientists at KSC have made a horrifying discovery.* 

*On a routine observation of the planet Duna, scientist have noticed a small dot making its way across the the plane of the planet. Upon closer inspection it turned out to be a extremely large asteroid. After calculating its orbit, the best calculations show that the people of Kerbin have a mere 5 years before this asteroid rains down destruction upon their green, lush planet. Gene Kerman, and the crew at KSC, don't believe their is a chance that they will be able to redirect it. So begins a top secret project to insure the survival of the Kerbal race.* 

**Scenario:**

The main goal of this mission log is to ensure the survival of the Kerbal race by colonizing other planets withing the Kerbol system within the allotted time frame. Once year 5 (time from is flexible but im pretty sure i can accomplish in that amount of time) has been reached, no more rockets or kerbals can be launched form Kerbin (as it will be devastated) However they can continue launching from any colonies that have been established already (I.E. a Mun Base etc) With the end goal being a large colony on Laythe it being the only semi-habitat planet in the Kerbol System other than Kerbin, and as many other colonies as possible. 

We are currently set to Career mode with the tech tree unlocked to the limit of the Tier 1 Science Center (Also using Community Tech Tree, for a more in depth Tree 

> ![SFkXB2e.png](http://i.imgur.com/SFkXB2e.png)

To help facilitate realism the following mods are used to help add challenge and fun: (will post a more complete list later) 

- **MKS/OKS** - The basis on which to build colonies on other planets
- **Kerbal Construction Time(KCT)**- So that rockets actually take time to build, adding to the challenge of the deadline.
- **TAC Life Support** - Because whats a Colony without life support.
- [**Extra Planetary Launchpads**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59545-0-90-Extraplanetary-Launchpads-v5-1-2)- Ability to build rockets and ships off world.
- [**Civilian Population**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112142-90-Civilian-Population-1-2?highlight=reproduction) **-** To simulate the civilian population we hope to bring along and survive (also allows for recruitable kerbals!)
- **Deadly Reentry** - For reentry heat
- **Ferram Aerospace Research** - For better spaceplanes!

> 
>  To be added later (real soon!)

*A cheer went up in the Kerbal Mission Control as the new "Kentaur I" rocket lifted off the pad carrying the long awaited Kubbel Space Telescope. After years of planning and designing, the scientists at Kerbal Command will finally be able to obtain a detailed view of the their home solar system.* 

![7wewdKY.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/7wewdKY.png?2)

*"Separation of stage one confirmed, ignition of stage two in 5....4....3....2....1...... stage. Fairing separation nominal."*

![CigYZwK.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/CigYZwK.png?1)

*"Orbital insertion complete! All systems are functioning within expected parameters. We should be receiving the first images shortly!"*

***2 Weeks Later:***

*Gene Kerman looks up from his paperwork as a sharp insistant knock sounds on the door. Without waiting for a response, Bob Kerman walks into the office carrying a thick stack of papers and what appear to be rolled up photographs.* 

*"What is it Bob? Im sort of a busy here." Gene says, motioning to all the papers stacked up on this desk.* 

*"That can wait Gene, you have the see this." Bob replies, swiping all of the piled paperwork to the floor, much to Gene's dismay.* 

*Bob unrolls the large photographs across the program directors desk, and lays one finger on a large dark spot on what appears to be a photo of Duna.* 

*"These are some great images Bob, from our new Space Telescope yes?" Gene asks, "But whats the big deal, ive seen several pictures already, the program appears to be a great success thus far.*

*Bob taps the dark spot on the image again, insistantly. "This Gene. This is the big deal."* 

*Gene squints down at the spot "What is it? Is our new telescope developing problems already?"*

*"That was our first thought, sir. But after running every test possible, everything is nominal" Bob frowns and sighs heavly.* 

*"Well then... what is it?" Gene asks, somewhat impatiently.* 

*"That sir , is a object, a very large object, by our best estimates, a very... very large asteroid, you could even call it a planitoid, approximately 80% the size of Gilly sir. And the bad news sir, it's on an intercept couse with Kerbin."*

*Gene looks up, flabbergasted "Are you sure Bob? How long do we have?"*

*"Absolutely sure, sir. We've rechecked its position using our most powerful ground telescopes. Though without confirmation from the Space telescopes, the anomaly might have just be chalked up to a piece of dust on the lens. If our calculations are correct, the object will be in our path in approximately 4 and a half years."*
